[File: aptos-core/storage/db-tool/src/backup.rs] [Lines: 187-194] [Version Confusion] Does StateSnapshotBackupController ensure the snapshot version matches the actual blockchain state version, or can version parameter manipulation create backups claiming to represent different ledger states? [File: aptos-core/storage/db-tool/src/backup.rs] [Lines: 196-205] [Transaction Tampering] In BackupType::Transaction execution, does TransactionBackupController cryptographically verify transaction authenticity before backup, or can modified transactions be backed up and later restored to corrupt chain history? [File: aptos-core/storage/db-tool/src/backup.rs] [Lines: 208-217] [Liveness Attack] In Command::Continuously handling, if BackupCoordinator.run() never returns due to infinite loop or deadlock, does this block critical node operations since run() consumes ownership of resources? (High)
